title: JIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Project Technical Support Posts
description: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc Nursing, Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the JIPMER Recruitment 2025 . Hee we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here is a l...
